function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Study of air conditioners and their relationship to the global pandemic may uncover risks related to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Failure to mitigate the risks may result in increased spread of the global pandemic.","Mitigation":"Implementing appropriate air conditioning systems and air filters, as well as modifying their positions, can limit the spread of the pandemic.","Technologies":"Advanced air purification technologies, HEPA filters, UV germicidal irradiation systems.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, general public.","Owner":"Health organizations, building management, air conditioning companies."}]}
